findings.title: Inadequate Interaction with Coin<StakedApt> in Treasury Address
findings.description: The contract lacks a mechanism to interact with Coin<StakedApt> in treasury_address, which may lead to stuck tokens and indefinite locking of assets.

findings.title: Conflict between comment and implementation in add function
findings.description: In the description for add function, it declares that this function can be invoked by either the delegation_manager or router, but with public permission, anyone can call this one.
